text: Bayer 04 Leverkusen Fußball GmbH, also known as Bayer 04 Leverkusen (German: [ˌbaɪ̯ɐ ˈleːvɐˌkuːzn̩]), Bayer Leverkusen, or simply Bayer, is a professional football club based in Leverkusen, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. The club competes in the Bundesliga, the top tier of German football, and plays its home matches at the BayArena. ==Other websites== *Bayer04.de - Official Webpage Category:Football clubs in North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Leverkusen Category:1904 establishments in Germany
title: Bayer 04 Leverkusen
